stimulusHtml: Which of the following was the most direct effect of commercial rivalries among France, Spain, England, and other European powers in the 1700s?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the rise of global markets in the 1700s.

choicesHtml: An increase in warfare between European states over possession of overseas colonies
An increase in the desire to protect the rights of indigenous peoples of the Americas
An increase in popularity of Enlightenment ideals of religious liberty
An increase in population as a result of new foods introduced from the Americas
